text: The premier of Prince Edward Island is the first minister for the Canadian province of Prince Edward Island. They are the province's head of government and de facto chief executive. The current premier of Prince Edward Island is Dennis King, from the Progressive Conservative Party. ==See also== * Prime Minister of Canada * Premier (Canada) * List of premiers of Prince Edward Island ==References== ==External links== * Premier of PEI Official Site *
title: Premier of Prince Edward Island
